name: Planetery Devastation
description:
Game made during the Concordia Makes Game Jam under the theme of Attraction, except issues came up with the project and we were not able to finish and polish the game as we would have preferred.

The objective of the game is to protect the planet that is behind your ship, since it keeps attracting asteroids to it.

Controls:

A - D : Move left and right

Space : Shoot

People involved:

Anik Patel
Jonathan Pauze
Sangeethan Thaventhiran

Planet Sprites taken from : https://deep-fold.itch.io/pixel-planet-generator
